Name: Falling Justice
Desc:
Dispenses justice with divine power.
Falling Justice's cooldown is affected by COOLDOWN REDUCTION. Does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.

Desc.Old:
Dispenses justice with divine power.
Falling Justice's cooldown is not affected by the COOLDOWN REDUCTION effect. Does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.
Desc.New:
Dispenses justice with divine power.
Falling Justice's cooldown is affected by COOLDOWN REDUCTION. Does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.
